Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. Centered on his friendship with childhood friend Yukko, it depicts our main character's challenges as a liberal thinker within oppressive social backgrounds, poignant disillusionment from Childhood ideals developed into teenage years, and even touches lightly upon his bipolar disorder that led to weakness in his health.
